DataType.Name: PID_D_time
DataType.Comment: D time in PID control (s) (0=not in use)

DataType.Name: PV_AutoSwitchState
DataType.Comment: Determins state of process value before switching (0= Good, 1=Uncertain, 2=Bad)

DataType.Name: EmergencyValve_TimeInterval_Hours
DataType.Comment: Time interval between forced emergency valve activations (h)

DataType.Name: MinuteIncrease_PerDay
DataType.Comment: Number of minutes increase in light duration per day (minute)

DataType.Name: MaxGainIncrease_PerDay
DataType.Comment: Value for increase in max output per day (%)

DataType.Name: MinGainDecrease_PerDay
DataType.Comment: Value for decrease in min output per day (%)

DataType.Name: StateCfg_PreDefinedOutput
DataType.Comment: Feedback value if fault (pre defined state/value) (%)

DataType.Name: PID_D_Tid
DataType.Comment: D time in PID control (s) (0=not in use)

DataType.Name: PV_AutoSwitchState
DataType.Comment: Determins state of process value before switching (0= Good, 1=Uncertain, 2=Bad)

DataType.Name: Direction
DataType.Comment: PID direction (FALSE= Direct acting, TRUE= Reverse acting)

DataType.Name: Step_NewOnLoss
DataType.Comment: Start replacement if one becomes unavailable or stops

DataType.Name: Delay_StepIn
DataType.Comment: Time process value must exceed threshold before actuator engages (s)

DataType.Name: Delay_StepOut
DataType.Comment: Time process value must be below threshold before actuator disengages (s)

DataType.Name: Limit_StepIn
DataType.Comment: Engages actuator if process value exceeds threshold

DataType.Name: Limit_StepOut
DataType.Comment: Steps out actuator if process value drops below limit

DataType.Name: StateCfg_PreDefinedOutput
DataType.Comment: Feedback value if fault (pre defined state/value) (%)

DataType.Name: Timer_StartTime_Hour
DataType.Comment: Start time for timer function (Hour part of HH:MM)

DataType.Name: Timer_StartTime_Minute
DataType.Comment: Start time for timer function (Minute part of HH:MM)

DataType.Name: RampTime_AdjMinMax
DataType.Comment: Ramp time when adjusting min or max output (s)

DataType.Name: Deadband
DataType.Comment: % deadband (% change in control value before change in output)

DataType.Name: Timer_StartTime_Hour
DataType.Comment: Start time for timer function (Hour part of HH:MM)

DataType.Name: Timer_StartTime_Minute
DataType.Comment: Start time for timer function (Minute part of HH:MM)

DataType.Name: StateMode
DataType.Comment: FALSE = High output - Actuator OFF | TRUE = High output - Actuator ON

DataType.Name: Timer_StartTime_Hour
DataType.Comment: Start time for timer function (Hour part of HH:MM)

DataType.Name: Timer_StartTime_Minute
DataType.Comment: Start time for timer function (Minute part of HH:MM)

DataType.Name: StateCfg_1_OK_State
DataType.Comment: FALSE = High input - OK state | TRUE = Low input - OK state

DataType.Name: StateCfg_2_OK_State
DataType.Comment: FALSE = High input - OK state | TRUE = Low input - OK state

DataType.Name: StateCfg_3_OK_State
DataType.Comment: FALSE = High input - OK state | TRUE = Low input - OK state

DataType.Name: StateCfg_4_OK_State
DataType.Comment: FALSE = High input - OK state | TRUE = Low input - OK state

DataType.Name: StateCfg_5_OK_State
DataType.Comment: FALSE = High input - OK state | TRUE = Low input - OK state

DataType.Name: ProcessValue_MaxLevel
DataType.Comment: Maximum actual measured process value (sensor scale 0-10m, physical range 2-8m)

DataType.Name: ProcessValue_MinLevel
DataType.Comment: Minimum actual measured process value (sensor scale 0-10m, physical range 2-8m)

DataType.Name: SignalValue_Visible
DataType.Comment: Enable/disable value display in SCADA (not applicable for directly measured or internal values, e.g. raw data)

DataType.Name: Cfg_DigAlarm_UseReturnDelay
DataType.Comment: Use return delay on pre alarm

DataType.Name: Cfg_SMS_Technical
DataType.Comment: SMS send to tecnical shift team

DataType.Name: Cfg_SMS_Guard
DataType.Comment: SMS send to guard shift team

DataType.Name: Cfg_SMS_OnlyDayTime
DataType.Comment: SMS only send at day shift team

DataType.Name: Sts_SuppressedDesc
DataType.Comment: Alarm suppressed description (e.g motor not running)

DataType.Name: Cfg_PreAlarm_UseReturnDelay
DataType.Comment: Use return delay on pre alarm

DataType.Name: Cfg_FullAlarm_UseReturnDelay
DataType.Comment: Use return delay on pre alarm

DataType.Name: Cfg_DayShift_StartTime_Hour
DataType.Comment: Time day shift start active (Hour part of HH:MM)

DataType.Name: Cfg_DayShift_StartTime_Minute
DataType.Comment: Time day shift start active (Minute part of HH:MM)

DataType.Name: Cfg_DayShift_EndTime_Hour
DataType.Comment: Time day shift end active (Hour part of HH:MM)

DataType.Name: Cfg_DayShift_EndTime_Minute
DataType.Comment: Time day shift end active (Minute part of HH:MM)

DataType.Name: Cfg_DayShift_Delay
DataType.Comment: Delay between priority at day shift (minutes)

DataType.Name: Cfg_DayShift_DelayAcknowledged
DataType.Comment: Delay next priority if acknoledged from SMS (minutes)

DataType.Name: Cfg_NightShift_StartTime_Hour
DataType.Comment: Time night shift start active (Hour part of HH:MM)

DataType.Name: Cfg_NightShift_StartTime_Minute
DataType.Comment: Time night shift start active (Minute part of HH:MM)

DataType.Name: Cfg_NightShift_EndTime_Hour
DataType.Comment: Time night shift end active (Hour part of HH:MM)

DataType.Name: Cfg_NightShift_EndTime_Minute
DataType.Comment: Time night shift end active (Minute part of HH:MM)

DataType.Name: Cfg_NightShift_Delay
DataType.Comment: Delay between priority at night shift (minutes)

DataType.Name: Cfg_NightShift_DelayAcknowledged
DataType.Comment: Delay next priority if acknoledged from SMS (minutes)

DataType.Name: Cfg_Acknowledgement_Message
DataType.Comment: Sent as confirmation of received acknowledgement per SMS

DataType.Name: Cfg_SirenTime
DataType.Comment: Siren time when new alarm occurs (s)
